main.bio: Riyad is a highly motivated and determined Senior at The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, pursuing a Bachelorâ€™s of Science in Computer Science. His experience includes entry level software development, Technology project management, and marketing. Riyad enjoys learning how people interact with technology in the vast ways that they do. He currently seeks an opportunity to further his experience in the fields of software engineering, product management, or business intelligence/AI. Furthermore, he aims to gain further knowledge on developing impactful human-technology interactions.
